title: CW168
author: CW168
content: https://ibb.co/WB8p806need help i got few tx stuck by using xverse wallet...is there any solution to speed up or cancel ? my left over btc also cant send out now =(

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: You can use viabtc because you transaction met the two requirements, but actually your transaction will be confirmed around in a hour, so you don't need to worry. I don't understand why you keep withdrawing for 0.00004999 BTC and there's a dust attack to bc1p6htsry4jrhljtkyly2dgfhth66h3ve2vdw3rpl2j5s4qcz72swxsmxa7ny, it's better to avoid to use this wallet and use other legitimate wallets e.g. bluewallet or electrum.   ‎ Quote from: https://mempool.space/tx/d32d36a5a1989a274aea042054ab4c5ae5de2d5f799d3231bae0f2acb0c6b73dSize   ‎315 BFee rate   171 sat/vBQuote from: https://www.viabtc.com/tools/txacceleratorPaste or enter the TXID you want to accelerate. The volume of a single transaction must be ≤0.5 KB, and the transaction fee rate should be ≥ 0.0001 BTC/KB.

comments.author: franky1
